connector.description: Upload, download and manage files, folders, groups, collaborations, etc. on box.com.

camel.source.path.apiName.name: camel.source.path.apiName
camel.source.path.apiName.description: What kind of operation to perform One of: [COLLABORATIONS] [COMMENTS] [EVENT_LOGS] [FILES] [FOLDERS] [GROUPS] [EVENTS] [SEARCH] [TASKS] [USERS]

camel.source.path.methodName.name: camel.source.path.methodName
camel.source.path.methodName.description: What sub operation to use for the selected operation

camel.source.endpoint.enterpriseId.name: camel.source.endpoint.enterpriseId
camel.source.endpoint.enterpriseId.description: The enterprise ID to use for an App Enterprise.

camel.source.endpoint.inBody.name: camel.source.endpoint.inBody
camel.source.endpoint.inBody.description: Sets the name of a parameter to be passed in the exchange In Body

camel.source.endpoint.userId.name: camel.source.endpoint.userId
camel.source.endpoint.userId.description: The user ID to use for an App User.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.httpParams.name: camel.source.endpoint.httpParams
camel.source.endpoint.httpParams.description: Custom HTTP params for settings like proxy host

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.authenticationType.name: camel.source.endpoint.authenticationType
camel.source.endpoint.authenticationType.description: The type of authentication for connection. Types of Authentication: STANDARD_AUTHENTICATION - OAuth 2.0 (3-legged) SERVER_AUTHENTICATION - OAuth 2.0 with JSON Web Tokens

camel.source.endpoint.accessTokenCache.name: camel.source.endpoint.accessTokenCache
camel.source.endpoint.accessTokenCache.description: Custom Access Token Cache for storing and retrieving access tokens.

camel.source.endpoint.encryptionAlgorith.name: camel.source.endpoint.encryptionAlgorithm
camel.source.endpoint.encryptionAlgorith.description: The type of encryption algorithm for JWT. Supported Algorithms: RSA_SHA_256 RSA_SHA_384 RSA_SHA_512 One of: [RSA_SHA_256] [RSA_SHA_384] [RSA_SHA_512]

camel.source.endpoint.maxCacheEntries.name: camel.source.endpoint.maxCacheEntries
camel.source.endpoint.maxCacheEntries.description: The maximum number of access tokens in cache.

camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyFile.name: camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyFile
camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyFile.description: The private key for generating the JWT signature.

camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyPassword.name: camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyPassword
camel.source.endpoint.privateKeyPassword.description: The password for the private key.

camel.source.endpoint.publicKeyId.name: camel.source.endpoint.publicKeyId
camel.source.endpoint.publicKeyId.description: The ID for public key for validating the JWT signature.

camel.source.endpoint.userName.name: camel.source.endpoint.userName
camel.source.endpoint.userName.description: Box user name, MUST be provided

camel.source.endpoint.userPassword.name: camel.source.endpoint.userPassword
camel.source.endpoint.userPassword.description: Box user password, MUST be provided if authSecureStorage is not set, or returns null on first call

camel.component.box.enterpriseId.name: camel.component.box.enterpriseId
camel.component.box.enterpriseId.description: The enterprise ID to use for an App Enterprise.

camel.component.box.userId.name: camel.component.box.userId
camel.component.box.userId.description: The user ID to use for an App User.

camel.component.box.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.component.box.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.box.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.box.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.box.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.box.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.box.httpParams.name: camel.component.box.httpParams
camel.component.box.httpParams.description: Custom HTTP params for settings like proxy host

camel.component.box.authenticationType.name: camel.component.box.authenticationType
camel.component.box.authenticationType.description: The type of authentication for connection. Types of Authentication: STANDARD_AUTHENTICATION - OAuth 2.0 (3-legged) SERVER_AUTHENTICATION - OAuth 2.0 with JSON Web Tokens

camel.component.box.accessTokenCache.name: camel.component.box.accessTokenCache
camel.component.box.accessTokenCache.description: Custom Access Token Cache for storing and retrieving access tokens.

camel.component.box.encryptionAlgorithm.name: camel.component.box.encryptionAlgorithm
camel.component.box.encryptionAlgorithm.description: The type of encryption algorithm for JWT. Supported Algorithms: RSA_SHA_256 RSA_SHA_384 RSA_SHA_512 One of: [RSA_SHA_256] [RSA_SHA_384] [RSA_SHA_512]

camel.component.box.maxCacheEntries.name: camel.component.box.maxCacheEntries
camel.component.box.maxCacheEntries.description: The maximum number of access tokens in cache.

camel.component.box.privateKeyFile.name: camel.component.box.privateKeyFile
camel.component.box.privateKeyFile.description: The private key for generating the JWT signature.

camel.component.box.privateKeyPassword.name: camel.component.box.privateKeyPassword
camel.component.box.privateKeyPassword.description: The password for the private key.

camel.component.box.publicKeyId.name: camel.component.box.publicKeyId
camel.component.box.publicKeyId.description: The ID for public key for validating the JWT signature.

camel.component.box.userName.name: camel.component.box.userName
camel.component.box.userName.description: Box user name, MUST be provided

camel.component.box.userPassword.name: camel.component.box.userPassword
camel.component.box.userPassword.description: Box user password, MUST be provided if authSecureStorage is not set, or returns null on first call
